price: Walang nagpapasinungaling doon kundi ang bawat tagalabag na makasalanan.
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
